[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/aptos_vm.rs] [Function: get_concurrency_level()] [Race condition] Can race conditions during concurrent access to EXECUTION_CONCURRENCY_LEVEL cause inconsistent concurrency settings across threads? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/aptos_vm.rs] [Function: new_for_block_executor()] [Async checks race] Can async_runtime_checks_enabled flag be modified concurrently during block execution, causing inconsistent runtime validation? (Medium)
